meanings.definition: Skill in using both hands equally well.
meanings.sent1: Her ambidexterities in painting allowed her to create beautiful art with both hands.
meanings.sent2: His ambidexterities in playing the piano amazed everyone in the audience.
meanings.sent3: The magician's ambidexterities with cards left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: His ambidexterities in sports made him a valuable player on the team.
meanings.sent5: The surgeon's ambidexterities in the operating room saved many lives.
